I look forward to voting for final passage of the #BuildBackBetter Act, which will make robust investments in #HBCUs & MSIs, expand the safety net for working families, and make a historic investment in fighting climate change.

The American people are counting on us to act NOW.

From paid family leave and Universal Pre-K to investments in maternal health and higher education, the #BuildBackBetter Act is an investment in our families. Parents will save thousands of dollars per year on child care and receive an extension of the Child Tax Credit tax cut.

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Framework invests in infrastructure and creates jobs.

These investments include improving and expanding the Charlotte Area Transportation System and Lynx Light Rail, and providing all CMS students with the broadband connection they need to succeed.

Tonight, I voted to pass the Bipartisan Infrastructure Bill and advance the #BuildBackBetter Act. These votes will create jobs, improve our infrastructure, and set the stage for Democrats to make a solid investment in the future of our families and our recovery from COVID-19.
